website_summaries.verdict: With attractive black and chrome styling, this versatile futon looks and behaves more like more affordable couch than a futon.
pros: Armrests detach to make it a fully flat bed for sleeping
Backrests recline for more comfortable posture when seated
Fold-down center armrest with two cup holders is a standout feature of this futon
cons: Material and construction are not as soft as other similar products
Futon frame sits very low to the ground, which may make it tough to get on and off of
Need a drill for front feet screws

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice on the pics but not that great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my bedroom -looks nice on the pictures but not very functional. It’s not comfortable to sit on it at all-I just throw my pillows on it at night or clothes before putting them away. Couldn’t figure out how to lock in the back to make it stay up-took me a whole of pushing it up until it somehow did. The side pillows /hand rests are just there-they do not attach-therefore if you sit on the sofa they easily come off. Don’t get that!
customer_reviews.author: DanielaV.

customer_reviews.title: A four year old could assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This product is peak america. It's got three pieces, it ships flat, it assembles in 8 minutes, and has optional cup holders for the drinks you have in front of the tv you are watching. Lies flat for overnight guests. Not that comfortable, or thick, but amazing for the money. It should come with a 12 pack of ramen, because that is where it belongs in your life, in the ramen era.
customer_reviews.author: Riverside

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money. Next day delivery
customer_reviews.text: This item was delivered NEXT DAY! To say I was surprised is an understatement. It's not very heavy but I definitely cannot lift the box by myself. From start to finish the set up process was less than 10 minutes. All the parts are tucked underneath the cushion I'm the back (where I will probably keep sheets for it). The couch was delivered with a rip in the top which is pretty annoying but it's not large enough to make going thru the entire dismantle and return process. Its not super comfortable for every day use but it will probably only get used 2-3 times a year so it serves it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Cute, simple and small
customer_reviews.text: So I got this knowing it was on the small side, for my office. It fits a fairly small wall, in this medium sized office. It was sooo easy to put together, it's not super comfortable, but I don't need It to be. It took a while to get it to stay put without being totally folded in half or totally flat.. but I got it there now. I'm happy with it and would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Corina Thoos

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically great - very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The couch looks great and really brightens up my space. It is pretty flimsy though which makes it feel cheap. Honestly the firmness everyone complains about is not bad at all. Ended up putting it on the food of my bed so that the bed can support the back of it. That way it feels very sturdy. It's small so it's a great bed couch if you're looking for that
customer_reviews.author: Gunnar

customer_reviews.title: Office couch
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect little couch for a home office or secondary living room. I didn’t find it as uncomfortable as some of the other reviews stated. The faux leather doesn’t feel cheap, thin, nor plastic like. The cup holders were such a cute touch. It’s super low to the ground so adjusting from a larger couch can be difficult. I will update if there’s any changes!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for minimal seating in a small space!
customer_reviews.text: Let me first say, this was purchased for minimal use. It is hard as a rock to sit on. The style and price made it perfect for what I needed. It assembled very easy. I am very happy with it. If you are looking for something to sit on all the time this isn’t it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Frey

customer_reviews.title: It stains
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this did not better rating. I set on it with a black pair of Lycra got stain stuck to the sofa, still noticeable..but is compact,easy or hardly any assemble need it. Not for sleeping unless you the type that don’t mind sleeping on the floor . I would always cover the seat. Never know when someone pants could stain
customer_reviews.author: Haydee

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: As far as for the couch itself yes I think it’s perfect for my studio. It was easy to put together I did it alone, it comes with everything. The only thing is it came horribly packaged. There’s a few rips & tears on the futon. My main problem was with best choice they would NOT allow me to cancel my order in the beginning I had literally just ordered it & tried to cancel minutes after, & they wouldn’t accept my refund. VERY money hungry! I was practically forced to buy this futon. Overall, Is it worth 179.99? Yes.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Affordable futon for our office/extra guest room. Looks good and came shipped whole. Just had to put the legs on (which were zipped inside the futon- I wonder if this is why some thought the legs were forgotten?). I like it. Again, it’s for our extra room. If you plan on sleeping on it and using it a lot I’d spend more money on a better futon. But for the price this is great.
customer_reviews.author: NateP

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart in about a month after purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The sofa started falling apart in quickly after purchase. The frame is made out of cheap plywood and crumbles when you screw the metal legs in. Horrible cheap quality, never again.
customer_reviews.author: Igster

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, ok to sit on
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. Futon was a but lower to the floor than I would have preferred however is easy to sit on. I have throw pillows on the futon which make it way more comfortable to sit in. Without the pillows the comfort level is just okay. My futon is located in my office so I don't sit in it very often however I feel it is sturdy and may be comfortable to sleep on maybe for the night definitely not made to be a bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer IH

customer_reviews.title: Great for small space but not super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Not super comfortable. Great for small spaces though. Was put inside my office. Velcro is attached to the “cusions” and a side to the “matters” type part. When folded out into a bed form the velcro will be attached still and you will have to pay on top of it which is kind of uncomfortable and annoying. Throw a sheet or two over top of it. Love the look of it though.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon Odonnell

customer_reviews.title: It’s PINK. On what planet is this couch even remotely white ?
customer_reviews.text: The couch is Blush PINK, NOT white. (Blush is putting it lightly). I even used the flash in my photos so no one could claim it was “warm lighting”. Notice the 2nd photo that has my closet and door in the background, which are both actually white. I’m not sure if I just happened to receive a couch that lived in a literal tanning bed for a few months before being shipped to me... or if people think this is actually white. Either way, unless you actually want a PINK COUCH, run as fast as you can and save your $200.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s pink.
customer_reviews.text: It’s pink. If you’re looking for white, this is not the product. In the attached picture, the leather ottomans are white. The product is exceptional otherwise. Might return... would like to but I let the box get rained on :(
customer_reviews.author: Zach L.

customer_reviews.title: Better looking in photos
customer_reviews.text: Product looks more luxurious and worth it in pictures. I immediately noticed how cheap this thing was fresh out the box. Doesn’t even feel like leather. Almost Wal-Mart quality. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ninos

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and Potentially Unsafe
customer_reviews.text: They really have you by the time you order this because the return process is too inconvenient, especially once you no longer have the box. So save yourself the hassle and don't order it in the first place. The futon is not nearly as nice as it might seem from the pictures. More troubling, it comes with an insert that warns: 1) Weight limit 500 lbs 2) The legs should be checked every 60 days to make sure they are fastened
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not worth the hassle of sending back
customer_reviews.text: Cute, cheap couch and comfort wasn’t bad either for the price. Seemed like such a steal until the back of the couch stopped standing up within three months of light usage. Although I’m glad it could still be returned it was a huge hassle to get to a ups store since they don’t offer pick up from home either this item.
customer_reviews.author: AlexisNicole

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this couch for my first apartment and I ordered white but ended up receiving the black one. They issued me a refund so I ended up keeping it. It wasn’t that easy to assemble considering you need an electric drill to put the screws in and I don’t have an electric drill so I ended up having to put the screws in with a screwdriver and my muscle. The pillows on the end don’t attach so they slip off. It’s relatively small. Only 2 people could sit on it and it’s not very comfortable. I wouldn’t recommend it for a living space but maybe an office space for people to sit while they are waiting.
customer_reviews.author: Daynna

customer_reviews.title: Good!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s above my expectations... Honestly it’s not comfortable, but it’s fine to use once in a while. It was easy (very easy) to assemble and it looks great! It’s a low profile so if you are looking for something a little bit higher from the ground, this won’t be your option.
customer_reviews.author: victor.migri

customer_reviews.title: It looks beautiful but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love the look but it has very little padding and the seat is a bit short. You can't lean back a lot. THe drink holder is a great addition. If you fold it down for a bed, it is not comfortable at all. I put a 3: gel pad down and it helped. It is really beautiful looking though.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Skau

customer_reviews.title: The Thing is freakin' PINK!
customer_reviews.text: The thing is PINK! I ordered white couch and it came in a light pink color. Sucks cause it looks pink. It will be a nice couch, perfect for my office space but its unusable in a PINK color. I will be returning and trying to order it one more time to hopefully get it in white. I'll try to update this after I return and get the second one
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The back legs are broken and I just unboxed it. I have the propped up against the wall but that just defeats the whole purpose! The only reason I’m not returning this right now is because I’m not mobile that was the reason I had it delivered in the first place! Negative star 👎🏽
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY UNCOMFORTABLE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: VERY VERY UNCOMFORTABLE!!... VERY VERY STIFF. The thing is the size of a loveseat... My daughter is only 12..and half of her legs stick out the bottom of it... THIS IS NOT A FUTON YOU CAN SLEEP ON IT DOES LAY BACK BUT YOU CANNOT SLEEP ON THIS THING??!
customer_reviews.author: wendy wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This couch is great for the price! I was able to assemble the couch by myself in about 10 minutes (it’s just screwing on the legs with the included Allen wrench). I did notice 2 or 3 loose threads on some of the seems but I didn’t mind, considering the price of the couch. There were no obvious defects. I’ve been using it for about 2 weeks now. The couch easily goes from sofa to flat futon.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart and back will not stay up to make a seat
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my RV. The back will not stay up on one of them and the cup holder was not attached on the other. I did not expect them to be plush because of the price but I did expect them to be intact and to at least work as a seat. I have written a complaint to the company and have not heard back. I’ll keep you posted.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable, poor quality, don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: This couch was easy to assemble and it looks nice in a room but this couch is not I repeat NOT comfortable nor is it sturdy. I’d give the comfort level a 1 and that’s only because I can’t go lower. One of the back legs of the couch caved in within only two months of me having it and it caved in on the side that I don’t even sit on. You are better off spending more money on a couch that will last more than two months save your money and don’t buy this piece of trash.
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I love how you can wipe off anything you spill on it they’re definitely a good buy especially when you just move into a home and you don’t have enough money for the big couch that you actually wanted or whatever the case may be I love it
customer_reviews.author: Rochella W.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. The seams are coming loose, middle cupholder piece broke off couch, just very poor quality! What a shame, I really wanted this to last more than two months.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Sofa as an accessory, but not a relaxation area
customer_reviews.text: The sofa is most likely intended for short and slender people. We ordered it because we liked the price and style, but it is not very comfortable for me to sit on it, since it is tough and low, and I am a tall girl. It seems to me that this sofa would look better in a nursery or in a waiting area, in some beauty salon or in a fitness room, than in a living area of ​​an apartment where you want to relax in front of the TV. Most likely later I will order a more comfortable and high sofa
customer_reviews.author: OLGA POVETKINA

customer_reviews.title: We don't like it!!
customer_reviews.text: Smells bad, chemistry Not comfortable, hard, we feel all the parts that are inside. After 10 minutes on it, the whole body begins to hurt. If you want to sleep on it, then this is simply not possible. Also too short for sleep. But the appearance is good, perhaps suitable for offices, more as a decoration than for use. But the pillows don't stick at all, constantly on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Daria

customer_reviews.title: We love this couch
customer_reviews.text: My daughter turned 10 and wanted a pre teen bedroom w/ a couch in it. This is perfect for her. It’s comfortable and really nice!! Very happy with my purchase. I bought white & it’s classy & beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Ferje01

customer_reviews.title: Not comfy, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks good it's convenient it's just not very comfy probably great for an office couch. But I keep it in my living room apartment and Laye down comforters on it and fall asleep sometime but it's very hard. I still like it so I gave it to three star.
customer_reviews.author: kkorras

customer_reviews.title: Don't Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Worst product I have purchased. Something red bled onto whole couch turning it pink. Might have been the instructions that were bright red. Tear on bottom. Also dirty because was not completely boxed and instead wrapped in plastic and clear tape in areas.
customer_reviews.author: marlainna

customer_reviews.title: Good product but color is off.
customer_reviews.text: This item is we say to assemble and sturdy. My issue with it is it should be white but has a pink hue about it. Mine is not true white so it clashes with the other white furniture in the space.
customer_reviews.author: Frank B.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love it! For the price is perfect. Heads up, the color is off white more pinkish (which I prefer honestly) but I’m sure some others want it to be pure white. Comfort is okay for sitting once in a while. It’s small and close to the ground but in my small apartment fits perfect. Overall I’m glad I bought this futon.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth K.

customer_reviews.title: Professional looking and functional.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for living room to look professional and be functional. Pleased. Value equal to price. Works for wife's home business.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick T Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: For daughters room. Nice white color. Very small hue of pink but not noticeable. Looks amazing. Okay in comfort. Get what you pay for. Inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Taylor

customer_reviews.title: You grt what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Cheap futon is cute but not even pretending to be comfortable. Purchased for a child's playroom but would not be suitable for an adult.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my chair! The pump even works! I read reviews saying that it pumps backwards and that is because it’s being installed backwards! I’m in love with everything. The only problem that o have with this company is that they shipped me 6 chairs when I paid for 7. I called Amazon so they should resolve this issue soon. I have no worries about Baasha fixing this for me!
customer_reviews.author: Kesala Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good only thing didn't like that in the back is Black.
customer_reviews.author: sebastianarlegui

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and doesn't look cheap at all
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical after reading all the terrible reviews, this couch is wonderful, I assembled it myself in 10 minutes, it's sturdy and no issues at all, I bought the white faux leather one, it's a little bigger than expected, I live in a tiny house and it takes up the whole living room, lol, but I'm happy with my purchase, you would never guess the price, looking at it, looks expensive well that's all, very happy
customer_reviews.author: Deb W

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy it for a child to sleep on
customer_reviews.text: It's not was expected bought for my 6 yr old grandchild not recommended for sleeping on only for looks I can only look at it in a toy room
customer_reviews.author: bev black

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHITE!! it’s light pink!!
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be white but it’s a pale pink and does not match my other furniture. Also, the arm rests are attached with Velcro. I don’t understand why the white is not white as advertised. It’s definitely pink!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad choice
customer_reviews.text: I have had this sofa for about 4 months and I love it. It isn't the softest which is why I gave it 4 stars but it meets my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It had one small tear and that must have happened while putting it in my camper. I took out the hard queen mattress. I have storage behind the futon. I needed it
customer_reviews.author: Elizabitch

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy
customer_reviews.text: We like it. It works perfect for our loft as we don’t tend to like bulky furniture. Makes the space look great.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Small but rather uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This is a cheap sofa. Small and very uncomfortable. Wasted effort unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Cute yet uncomfortable!  Slab seating!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and better yet...super easy to put together, but man oh man is it uncomfortable! I would not suggest this for anything other than a play room or room where you won't want to sit for more than 20 minutes! It's perfect for my home office though.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Small Spaces!
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for my camper. It’s comfortable to sit in but not for sleeping. If someone wants to stay overnight.... good luck! It is also very pleasing to look at. Had lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Pellegrene

customer_reviews.title: Not a living room couch more for like a loft or sitting room
customer_reviews.text: Not a comfort couch by any means it's a bit small and sits more for company or entertaining than for an everyday couch. Ended up putting it in my loft and not in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: DML

customer_reviews.title: its great and looks awesome.
customer_reviews.text: my kid loves it. It is awesome.ups messed up tge box and tge customer service was great. Very very happy
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: The color is not really white
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble; two slim people fit for sleeping. Regretfully the color of the material is not white; it has slightly pink, as it got stained when washed with something else, which was a real disappointment since the decoration of the room is white. Would have liked to return it, but it would be too complicated. I would invest a bit more money and buy next time a real leather sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Neris M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: The size was perfect for a small dressing room. The comfort is ok but a little on the too firm side. My over all satisfaction is still a five star
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nah, thank you.
customer_reviews.text: The most uncomfortable couch I’ve ever sat on. Was so happy to sell it on Offer Up. Looks cute tho. Smaller than you think lol.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Futon Sofa and it’s incomplete. It’s missing everything. The hardware tool, screws, washers, straight legs, angled legs, and armrest. I can’t assemble it. I emailed the company. I hope they are quick to respond and address this issue efficiently and professionally.
customer_reviews.author: Paola

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the product is so poorly made, that the leg went straight through the wood frame that makes up the bottom of the couch. I’ve had this product since August but since I just moved into a new place I was finally able to open it and assemble it. As soon as I sat down the couch came crashing down. I followed all assembly directions and I only weigh 120lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bc my living area isn’t big . I love it it works with an added touch of cute throw pillows . But beware if you have you have a cat or dog this will be a no no for them to even touch . Overall I love it it’s very contemporary 😍
customer_reviews.author: Kim b

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and striking white. not the most comfortable though.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a cute way to dress up my daughters room & fill space. It was easy to put together and cute. But it looks pink, not white. Not sure why, but whatever, everything in her room is pink anyway. Serves its purpose for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: this is really a great value I used it first for a baby shower chair for mom and dad. now its a great addition to their decor
customer_reviews.author: HIGDALIYAH YISRAEL

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This futon is beautiful! I was impressed as soon as I took it out of the box. Very elegant and practical. I'm a big fan!
customer_reviews.author: mulsau

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. If you have a small space it'll fit perfect. So convention, not very comfy but it'll do fine for someone who's staying for a couple of days
customer_reviews.author: victor Emilio taveras

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like the design just not so comfortable.surface is hard and the color is not pure white. Very normal quality
customer_reviews.author: APPLE LUO

customer_reviews.title: Futon
customer_reviews.text: So far so good Pros: Nice bright White, even though its hard guest seem to love this item in my home Cons: It is hard
customer_reviews.author: aloha34

customer_reviews.title: Twin, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It’s a twin size for sure, it’s very nice easy to put together. Goes great in my office as decor
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: The product came in the color as described with all the parts and contents intact. However, the back of the recliner is not covered in faux leather as pictured but with black underlining so I was disappointed. Overall, it's not a bad item.
customer_reviews.author: Julius St Clair

customer_reviews.title: Came Damaged
customer_reviews.text: It would have been a very nice piece of furniture but it came ripped. The box was damaged but there was a rip in the futon which I don’t understand. For this price it should not come damaged!
customer_reviews.author: Adria

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two white futons, however one looks bright white and the other is ivory. Contacted the seller, however have not received any response. The product is cheaply made. Don't plan to use. It's extremely uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Neringa michau

customer_reviews.title: I am 50/50 on what I think about this.
customer_reviews.text: The price is great but the product not so much. It looks much prettier on the phone that in reality. The back side is made from black cloth and it makes the couch look very ugly when is on open spaces like mine. It is very uncomfortable to seat on. 10 minutes is the most that you can handle. I would return it, if my fedex delivery didn’t leave the package outside in rain. The box is totally ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality, cool modern look
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! It looks expensive, nice quality. Awesome modern look, love cup holders. I got a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: daniela

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful chair but the back that recline in horrible to lay on the end you sit on is ok if you’re a small person
customer_reviews.author: Terranocie Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not for us!
customer_reviews.text: It was a nice addition to our office but it was smaller than expected. I feel like only small peope would feel comfortable to sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: Trang K Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my couch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this couch for the look to be honest. It was easy to carry upstairs (guess I am some kind of Rambo girl)
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble but it isn’t actually white it is off white.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Okay buy
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but it’s more looks then comfort, I wouldn’t buy it for my living room but it’s a nice look.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Good Futon, Bad Color!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about the futon except the color. I ordered white and its an off/white kinda cream. I was soooooo disappointed. I was just 2 lazy to box it up because it is so heavy. Make sure before u assembly it, check the color.😥😥😥
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Coggins

customer_reviews.title: So Versatile and Attractive
customer_reviews.text: As comfortable as you can expect while sitting on a leather futon. Love that it becomes a bed. You can buy some pretty nice butt and back cushions that can transfer to your vehicle’s seat for $30, then it becomes perfect if you plan to sit for more than a few hours or have back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Overnight Pet Sitting in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I used this piece in my home office. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I love my sofa, it fit perfectly and good size for my living room. I use it when I’m exercising as well to do some body positions.
customer_reviews.author: philorise

customer_reviews.title: Its Pink! Not white....
customer_reviews.text: So I just bought a new house and I was like yes! I'm gonna get new living room furniture! Well my couch and chairs I purchased are all supposed to be white leather, but ya know what happened? My couch got here, looked pretty good, but then I set it next to the chairs and its pink! Lmao it god damn pink! LORD HELP ME!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: We were excited to receive this product but when it arrived it was smaller than anticipated and was not WHITE - it was an off white - super disappointment. We returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Happy  customer
customer_reviews.text: The futon is exactly what I needed for the space I ordered it for. I am very happy with how it looks. I do not recommend using FedEx in the future. They tagged the futon as delivered and two days later it was delivered to the wrong address. The old neighbors that used to live there would have kept it.
customer_reviews.author: EO

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Its beautiful and soft. Very convenient for my small apartment
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s amazing. Came in perfect condition. It’s super cute. This is not a couch you can pile up on with the fam tho. It’s more decorative than actually functional but that works for me. It IS comfortable though. For 180$ it’s awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Very Fast Shipping, Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Amazon said it would take two weeks to deliver but it ended up getting here in less than 48 hours. Extremely happy about how quick they are about sending it. Couch is very sturdy and easy to assemble. A little less comfortable than I expected, about as comfortable as the back of a car. Would recommend though
customer_reviews.author: Harrison

customer_reviews.title: A little short n close to the ground but I ...
customer_reviews.text: A little short n close to the ground but I have it my office so it's not used much but it looks very nice
customer_reviews.author: Tywan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you have kids or pets lol
customer_reviews.text: You get what You pay for. The cup holder is great. Not comfy not cushiony gets dirty super easy. Personally for me this was a questionable buy
customer_reviews.author: Shannen Helton

customer_reviews.title: Cute, not comfy
customer_reviews.text: I loved how the design and look appeared, the only issue is the comfort. It’s not the greatest on comfort at all to sit on. Really small but cute for game rooms or small apartments. The legs aren’t sturdy enough to hold or last too long
customer_reviews.author: M&A

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: One of the couches was not in best condition looks like it was used or i don’t if it was damaged on the way or made wrong I don’t know , also they get dirty very easily I wear black pants for work and every time I sit on it it seams to stain ,not very comfortable but is not comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Gianna M.

customer_reviews.title: Modern look for small space
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this piece. Not so comfortable to sleep on, but well worth the price. Not bad for sitting and watching tv, would be even more comfortable with a ottoman. My dogs love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but also not great
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can’t ask for much more. Not really the most comfortable thing in the world, and it’s not truly white like in the picture more like a cream colored. Easy to assemble and fits well into the small space.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this a little over a month and its broke 3 times already. VERY cheaply made and extremely uncomfortable to use. This purchase was a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Gilley

customer_reviews.title: Its alright
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. I wish the back could hold up on it's own, but you have to prop it against the wall. The assembly was super easy. It only took about 10 minutes from box to finish.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Brannon

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great looking couch but it’s not very comfortable for a long period of time. I’ve had it since late August, now being 12/21, and it squeaks when you move and the back is starting to give out. Lots of padding required when sleeping on it if you don’t want your back to go out on you after you wake up.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Ann

customer_reviews.title: Couch At Curb For Garbage Pickup 6 Months After Purchasing...
customer_reviews.text: After repairing the couch 3 times, it is finally at the curb where it belongs. Hoping that this particular couch was just a defective lemon, we contacted the company to request an exchange/replacement, but they never responded. VERY UNHAPPY WITH COUCH AND SELLER!! :(
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Dauksys

customer_reviews.title: It’ll do for now
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my SheShed and it arrived on time but it came out the box with a pink hue tone to it .. I plan to place a throw over it but that wasn’t my intention at all. I can’t get the hue out of it so I give this item a 2/3
customer_reviews.author: Camellia

customer_reviews.title: I liked it but it came ripped
customer_reviews.text: The couch fits great for the space, its nice. I just had a hard time because i ordered it and it came ripped then returned it , took forever to reimburse the money and then purchased it again because I really liked it and then again it was ripped. This time it was on the back of the sofa so you cant see it , but still ripped.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: It’s really cute
customer_reviews.text: I ❤️ It for rental purposes & so do my clients wish the back was white but it’s black only complaint
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Easy Assembly... delivered damaged.
customer_reviews.text: The futon was very fast & easy to assemble. It fit perfectly in my home studio room. Unfortunately, it was delivered damaged on the upper left section. Other than that, I thought it was a great purchase. Hopefully I can just get an undamaged replacement ASAP. - Daydra
customer_reviews.author: Daydrian Love
